Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>. Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3068</S> from the heavens<S>8064</S>: praise<S>1984</S> him in the heights<S>4791</S>. <sup>Praise ye the LORD. Praise: Heb. Hallelujah, etc</sup>
Praise<S>1984</S> ye him, all his angels<S>4397</S>: praise<S>1984</S> ye him, all his hosts<S>6635</S>.
Praise<S>1984</S> ye him, sun<S>8121</S> and moon<S>3394</S>: praise<S>1984</S> him, all ye stars<S>3556</S> of light<S>216</S>.
Praise<S>1984</S> him, ye heavens<S>8064</S> of heavens<S>8064</S>, and ye waters<S>4325</S> that be above the heavens<S>8064</S>.
Let them praise<S>1984</S> the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>: for he commanded<S>6680</S>, and they were created<S>1254</S>.
He hath also stablished<S>5975</S> them for ever<S>5703</S> and ever<S>5769</S>: he hath made<S>5414</S> a decree<S>2706</S> which shall not pass<S>5674</S>.
Praise<S>1984</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> from the earth<S>776</S>, ye dragons<S>8577</S>, and all deeps<S>8415</S>:
Fire<S>784</S>, and hail<S>1259</S>; snow<S>7950</S>, and vapour<S>7008</S>; stormy<S>5591</S> wind<S>7307</S> fulfilling<S>6213</S> his word<S>1697</S>:
Mountains<S>2022</S>, and all hills<S>1389</S>; fruitful<S>6529</S> trees<S>6086</S>, and all cedars<S>730</S>:
Beasts<S>2416</S>, and all cattle<S>929</S>; creeping things<S>7431</S>, and flying<S>3671</S> fowl<S>6833</S>: <sup>flying: Heb. birds of wing</sup>
Kings<S>4428</S> of the earth<S>776</S>, and all people<S>3816</S>; princes<S>8269</S>, and all judges<S>8199</S> of the earth<S>776</S>:
Both young men<S>970</S>, and maidens<S>1330</S>; old men<S>2205</S>, and children<S>5288</S>:
Let them praise<S>1984</S> the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>: for his name<S>8034</S> alone is excellent<S>7682</S>; his glory<S>1935</S> is above the earth<S>776</S> and heaven<S>8064</S>. <sup>excellent: Heb. exalted</sup>
He also exalteth<S>7311</S> the horn<S>7161</S> of his people<S>5971</S>, the praise<S>8416</S> of all his saints<S>2623</S>; even of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, a people<S>5971</S> near<S>7138</S> unto him. Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>.
